description.value:
This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can take a Magic|XPHB action to expend 1 charge. For 1 minute, you know the direction of the nearest creature Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile to you within 60 feet, but not its distance from you. The wand can sense the presence of Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile creatures that are Invisible|XPHB, ethereal, disguised, or hidden, as well as those in plain sight. The effect ends if you stop holding the wand. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll 1d20. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

Attunement: true
